step_feedback.feedback: Great start! Keep your hands clasped comfortably in your lap, maintaining good posture.
Good job raising your hands. Try to keep your elbows a bit closer to your head as you bring your hands up.
Nicely done spreading your elbows wide behind your head. Focus on keeping your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Holding steady! Remember to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward. This helps maximize the stretch.
Excellent return to the starting position. You're doing great with this movement.
Second rep, looking good! Ensure your hands are clasped comfortably and your posture is tall.
You're raising your hands well. Continue to focus on keeping those elbows close to your head as you lift.
Great job spreading your elbows wide. Remember the tip to keep your head upright and avoid pulling forward.
Holding strong! Keep your head up and avoid pulling forward to get the most out of this stretch.
Perfectly reversed motion back to the start. You've completed both repetitions smoothly.

exercise_summary: You're doing a great job with the Clasp and Spread exercise! Remember to keep your head upright and elbows close when raising your hands, and spread them wide behind your head. This helps improve shoulder and chest flexibility.
